# VEHICLE::SET_CARGOBOB_EXCLUDE_FROM_PICKUP_ENTITY

## Summary
Sets a flag that forces a vehicle to not be detached from the cargobob even if there are collisions

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** cargobobIndex
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entityIndex

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Attaches an entity to a cargobob
